dict.acceptation: 相等地；平等地；公正地；平均；

sent.orig: Before God we all equally wise -- equally foolish.
sent.trans: 在神之前，你我都同样聪明，也同样愚蠢。

sent.orig: Before God we all equally wise-and equally foolish.
sent.trans: 在神面前，我们都同样聪明-也同样愚蠢。

sent.orig: And, as everyone knows, it is easier to spread hardship equally than to disseminate blessings equally.
sent.trans: 正如人人都知道的那样，公平地传播痛苦比公平地传播祝福要容易得多。

sent.orig: The orchestration was equally simple and equally just right.
sent.trans: 伴奏的配器法也同样质朴，同样地恰到好处。

sent.orig: She was slender as a willow shoot is slender-and equally graceful, equally erect(Frank Norris)
sent.trans: 她象柳枝一样的苗条——一样的优美，一样的挺拔（弗兰克诺里斯）
